blogPost.excerpt: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
blogPost.body: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
blogPost.title: Nwicode - Build apps for every platform, without code ✨
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Nwcode - 是一个无代码平台，用于构建强大的网络和移动应用程序，可以包括支付，通知等。与Woocommerce、Shopify的整合只需两次点击。
localize.tagline: 为每个平台构建应用程序，无需代码✨。

localize.description: Nwcode - 是一個無代碼平臺，用於構建強大的網絡和移動應用程序，可以包括支付，通知等。與Woocommerce、Shopify的整合只需兩次點擊。
localize.tagline: 爲每個平臺構建應用程序，無需代碼✨。

previous.excerpt: One-of-a-kind portrait, landscape and abstract artworks created by Artificial Intelligence. Each artwork is minted as a non-fungible token (NFT) on Ethereum's own blockchain.
previous.title: AImade.art 2.0 - Crypto art created by Artificial Intelligence

localize.description: 人工智能创作的独一无二的肖像、风景和抽象艺术作品。每件艺术品都是作为Ethereum自己的区块链上的非可替换代币（NFT）铸造的。
localize.tagline: 人工智能创造的加密艺术

localize.description: 人工智能創作的獨一無二的肖像、風景和抽象藝術作品。每件藝術品都是作爲Ethereum自己的區塊鏈上的非可替換代幣（NFT）鑄造的。
localize.tagline: 人工智能創造的加密藝術

next.excerpt: With embed.so, you just need to upload a video, and you will get the embed code in minutes. Place the code to your website, and see the video gets displayed 🤩 It's time to upgrade your website, make it more personal and engaging! 💪
next.title: embed.so - Embed videos to make your website more personal and engaging

localize.description: 有了embed.so，你只需要上传一个视频，你会在几分钟内得到嵌入代码。将代码放置到您的网站，并看到视频显示🤩现在是时候升级您的网站，使其更加个性化和吸引人! 💪
localize.tagline: 嵌入视频，使您的网站更加个性化和吸引人。

localize.description: 有了embed.so，你只需要上傳一個視頻，你會在幾分鐘內得到嵌入代碼。將代碼放置到您的網站，並看到視頻顯示🤩現在是時候升級您的網站，使其更加個性化和吸引人! 💪
localize.tagline: 嵌入視頻，使您的網站更加個性化和吸引人。
